original_title: The Chieftains - Live Over Ireland: Water From The Well
overview: Prolific and popular since the 1970s, the band members of the Chieftains -- Derek Bell, Kevin Conneff, Martin Fay, Sean Keane, Matt Molloy, and Paddy Moloney -- talk about what Irish music means to them, what inspired them in the past, and what continues to motivate them.
title: The Chieftains - Live Over Ireland: Water From The Well
